thread.title: SP does not rule out UP cabinet reshuffle
thread.title_full: SP does not rule out UP cabinet reshuffle

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: SP does not rule out UP cabinet reshuffle
text:
Comments Lucknow, Oct 26 : Amid speculation of reshuffle in Akhilesh Yadav ministry in Uttar Pradesh, ruling Samajwadi Party today did not rule it out completely. ”You ask this to the Chief Minister,” SP General Secretary Ram Gopal Yadav told reporters when asked about the possibility of reshuffle. (Also Read: Narendra Modi offers assistance to Afghanistan, Pakistan after earthquake) When asked again, he said, “Ho bhi sakta hai aur nahi bhi (It may or may not take place).” Speculation is rife about reshuffle in Akhilesh Yadav cabinet since some time with party supremo Mulayam Singh Yadav venting his ire from various platforms against non-performing ministers. The last cabinet reshuffle was carried out nearly two years ago. The ministry currently has 56 members — cabinet 26, including CM, MoS (Independent) five and MoS 25. The state can have four more ministers. 
Modified Date: October 26, 2015 4:45 PM Topics:
